      • lateralWindow

        public static javafx.scene.layout.VBox lateralWindow(Patient patient,
                                                     Arm leftArm,
                                                     Arm rightArm)
        This method creates the lateral window with the patient's informations and the tool selection interface.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient used in this simulation.
        leftArm - The left arm.
        rightArm - The right arm.
        Returns:
        The lateral window.
